location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Memoranda on Persia: (a) Gendarmerie, (b) [Anglo-Persian] Loan, (c) Shiraz, (d) Meshed [Mashhad]

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at f 40, and terminates at f 51, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the bottom right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains the following memoranda:C137A 'Gendarmerie', f 40;C137B 'Loan', ff 41-42;C137C 'Shiraz', ff 43-46;C137D 'Meshed', ff 47-51.The memoranda are written by Sir Arthur Hirtzel.
